original_text: Then he said to me, ‘Daniel, do not be afraid. God has listened to your prayers since the time that you first turned to him. You wanted to understand about God. You put yourself under his authority. So I have come to bring the answer to your prayers.
korean_text: 그가 내게 이르되 다니엘아 두려워하지 말라 네가 깨달으려 하여 네 하나님 앞에 스스로 겸비하게 하기로 결심하던 첫날부터 네 말이 응답 받았으므로 내가 네 말로 말미암아 왔느니라

sentences.original_text: God has listened to your prayers
since the time that you first turned to him
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 처음으로 그에게 돌아온 그 때부터

sentences.original_text: You wanted to understand about God
You put yourself under his authority
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 자신을 그의 권위 아래 두었다

sentences.original_text: So I have come to bring the answer to your prayers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 너의 기도에 대한 대답을 가져오기 위해 왔다
